name: Meaningless Blob Slaughter
description:
W, S to move forward and back.

A,D to turn left and right.

Left mouse button to shoot.

R to reset the level.

Escape to quit.

Turn the volume down, the sound settings are off due to my stupidity.

Walk around, shoot blobs. No end, but it starts like nothing is happening either.

Music by: http://tones.wolfram.com/generate

Sound by: https://www.bfxr.net

2D Art by: http://img.uninhabitant.com/spritegen.html
